NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Mr. Grayd on Ausmu s
President, NAEB
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Dear Graydon:
Harry asked me to react to his suggestion that
Morris Novik be given a free hand to go ahead with
informal discussions on a national level. Until this
has been discussed thoroughly with Board members and
especially with key station managers, I believe there
exists great danger. I also realize that something
must be done. I do not see, however,why such dis¬
cussions cannot take place on a local level and be
worked out on that basis.
✓
W dn
cc: Harry Skornia
